org.apache.avro.io.JsonEncoder

    Package Description
    org.apache.avro.io
    Utilities for Encoding and Decoding Avro data.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      JsonEncoder JsonEncoder.configure(org.codehaus.jackson.JsonGenerator generator)
      Deprecated. 
      internal method
      JsonEncoder JsonEncoder.configure(OutputStream out)
      Reconfigures this JsonEncoder to use the output stream provided.
      JsonEncoder EncoderFactory.jsonEncoder(Schema schema, org.codehaus.jackson.JsonGenerator gen)
      Deprecated. 
      internal method
      JsonEncoder EncoderFactory.jsonEncoder(Schema schema, OutputStream out)
      Creates a JsonEncoder using the OutputStream provided for writing data conforming to the Schema provided.
      JsonEncoder EncoderFactory.jsonEncoder(Schema schema, OutputStream out, boolean pretty)
      Creates a JsonEncoder using the OutputStream provided for writing data conforming to the Schema provided with optional pretty printing.
